properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 21 at 9:03PM PST until January 23 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...
- Small Craft Advisory conditions tonight and early Wednesday
morning; southwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt
and seas 12 to 15 ft at 14 seconds.
- Gale conditions expected late Wednesday morning and Wednesday
afternoon; south winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas around 13 ft at 12 seconds.
- Gale conditions possible Wednesday night and Thursday morning;
south winds 25 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas
around 15 ft at 10 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM.

* WHEN...
- Small Craft Advisory in effect until 10 AM Wednesday morning.
- Gale Warning in effect from 10 AM until 4 PM Wednesday.
- Gale Watch in effect Wednesday evening through Thursday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
